sn35.236:1.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ sati cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ …pe…
sn35.236:1.6: jivhāya sati jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ …pe…
sn35.236:1.7: manasmiṃ sati manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ …pe….
sn35.236:2.1: Hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati ādānanikkhepanaṃ na paññāyati;
sn35.236:2.4: kucchismiṃ asati jighacchā pipāsā na paññāyati.
sn35.236:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ asati cakkhusamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ …pe…
sn35.236:2.7: manasmiṃ asati manosamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhan”ti.
